name: DC Universe Online: Episode 33 - Atlantis
summary: The battle for the Crown continues in Episode 33: Atlantis. Corum Rath has set his sights on the Throne and has plotted a rebellion with his Deluge conspirators. Go beneath the sea to a brand new, stunning rendition of Atlantis, and put a stop to the uprising. Do you have what it takes to save the city and restore power to the throne?
